snippet: The editor and publisher of The Hardwick Gazette, the grand prize in an essay contest, extended the deadline after submissions fell short....
abstract: Ross Connelly, editor of small town Vermont newspaper The Hardwick Gazette, has opened essay contest to determine paper's next editor and to raise funds to ease transition as he heads toward retirement; contest has failed to garner enough applicants, pointing to challenges faced by community newspapers across nation.
lead_paragraph: The editor and publisher of The Hardwick Gazette, the grand prize in an essay contest, extended the deadline after submissions fell short.

headline.main: Want to Own a Newspaper? A Vermont Contest Has Trouble Finding Takers
headline.print_headline: An Essay Test for the Future of a Newspaper
